function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of high-definition images and videos and huge volume data","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission of contagious diseases due to close contact","Mitigation":"Use of technology to enable remote operators to complete tasks without close contact","Technologies":"5G technology for high-definition image and video transmission, URLLC for reducing delay and data loss","People":"Remote operators, onsite personnel","Owner":"Telecommunication companies, technology providers"},{"Description":"Close contact of persons in the built environment","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Use of technology to enable operations without close contact","Technologies":"5G network for data transmission and cloud analysis, terminal operation based on analytical instructions","People":"General public, workers, employees","Owner":"Technology providers, built environment stakeholders"}]}
